definitions.text: merriment expressed by a brightness or gleam or animation of countenance
examples: he had a sparkle in his eye
there's a perpetual twinkle in his eyes

definitions.text: the occurrence of a small flash or spark
the quality of shining with a bright reflected light

examples: Unquarried marble sparkled on the hillside

definitions.text: be lively or brilliant or exhibit virtuosity
examples: his playing coruscated throughout the concert hall
A high tension wire, brought down by a storm, can continue to spark

definitions.text: become bubbly or frothy or foaming
